text: DON'T MISS 'It wasn't a showmance for ME': Bianca Gascoigne throws dig at CBB ex Jamie O'Hara... as she shows him what he's missing in very sexy lingerie shoot 'Happy Valentine's Day, gorgeous baby daddy-to-be': Pregnant Binky Felstead puckers up to shirtless beau Josh 'JP' Patterson in romantic snap PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Borrowed from racy Rosie? Helen Flanagan flaunts her ample cleavage and abs in a red lace bralet on date night with Scott Sinclair Lucy Mecklenburgh flaunts her flawless figure in sexy lingerie for her raciest shoot yet... as she admits going through a public break-up is difficult 'I grew out of love': Emmerdale star Michelle Hardwick announces separation from wife Rosie Nicholl after two-years of marriage Sienna Miller shares a joke with co-stars Robert Pattinson and Charlie Hunnam at Berlin International Film Festival following late-night dinner date Chrissy Teigen smoulders in racy lingerie as she serenades husband John Legend for sexy Valentine's Day LOVE shoot Teri Hatcher, 52, boasts a remarkably smooth visage as she lands in Canada to film new villain role in Supergirl Not a line in sight From perp walk to catwalk: America's hottest felon swaps his DOC duds for couture as he makes his debut at NYFW in front of Kylie Jenner and Madonna Ringing in a new chapter! Bieber's ex Hailey Baldwin models very sexy feathered mini dress as his proteg√©e Madison Beer flashes her abs in a crop top 'It's over, BBC need to accept that': Top Gear faces backlash from fans on Twitter as new series is announced... after ratings plummeted last year Picture purr-fect! Jamie Oliver leads the Valentine's Day tributes as he shares twenty year old throwback snap of beloved wife Jools Love is in the air Cold Feet's James Nesbitt reflects on the demise of his 22-year marriage to wife Sonia... as he credits ¬£20k hair transplant with reinvigorating his career 'Saddened' Tamara Beckwith is pictured for the first time since her friend Tara Palmer-Tomkinson died... as she cuddles up to son Vero on ski slopes in Gstaad Nothing desperate here! Eva Longoria sizzles in figure-flaunting grey jeans and daring turtleneck as she steps out in LA Never looked better Tom Holland and Ella Purnell spark dating rumours as they get 'very close' at BAFTA afterparty... before 'heading back to his hotel together' Kylie Jenner flashes a hint of underboob in heavily embellished white mini dress and flat thigh high boots at Phillipp Plein NYFW show Madonna puts on a playful display at Phillipp Plein's NYFW show as she makes her first public appearance since adopting Malawian twins From family to fashion 'It puts a puts a big smile on my face': Pregnant Binky Felstead showcases eternity ring her late dad gave to her mum in emotional Instagram post 'Our relationship is a little wobbly at times': Louise Thompson and Ryan Libbey wear matching clothing as they share yet another cringey exercise video Katherine Jenkins seen for the first time following David Beckham's email hacking scandal brushing off the drama with a smile in Wales 'We won't perform for a few years': Una Healy wears VERY risqu√© dress and reveals there are no plans for The Saturdays to reform anytime soon On a different track: Haley Bennett debuts chic new pixie cut as she looks worlds away from her The Girl On The Train persona Chop and change 'All that money, but can't clean her windows!' Katie Price is mocked for 'Happy Xmas' scrawling seen in her home... SEVEN WEEKS after season Ellie Bamber stuns in a dazzling bardot fifties inspired prom dress as she hits the red carpet at the ELLE Style Awards Retro glamour 'They have a crazy connection:' New couple The Weeknd and Selena Gomez are said to be 'falling for each other' after weeks of dating Weeknd vibes Matt LeBlanc beams while posing alongside Top Gear co-hosts in first promo shot for new season... as show returns without embattled Chris Evans Bella Hadid poses in a sports bra and leggings as she's announced as the new face of luxury watch brand TAG Heuer She maintains her trim figure with boxing My little cub! Doting mother Megan Fox carries six-month-old baby Journey on her chest as she shops for cosmetics Her bundle of joy Hawaiian holidays, a ten-year supply of make-up, diet pills and magic apples: The ¬£160,000 Oscars goodie bag a select band of nominees will receive Kim Kardashian arrives in New York to support Kanye West at Yeezy 5 show ... amid claims pressure may be 'too much stress' for recovering rapper Iskra Lawrence flashes famed curves at ELLE Style Awards... as she reveals critics claim her body confidence crusade is 'all for money' Belle of the ball!
